mapper.select: SELECT DOMAINNAME , SUM(ECODE01+ECODE02+ECODE03+ECODE04+ECODE05+ECODE06+ECODE07+ECODE08 +ECODE09+ECODE10+ECODE11+ECODE12+ECODE13+ECODE14+ECODE15+ECODE16 +ECODE17+ECODE18+ECODE19+ECODE20+ECODE21+ECODE41+ECODE42) TOTAL , SUM(ECODE01) SUCCESS , SUM(ECODE02+ECODE03+ECODE04+ECODE05+ECODE06+ECODE07+ECODE08 +ECODE09+ECODE10+ECODE11+ECODE12+ECODE13+ECODE14+ECODE15+ECODE16 +ECODE17+ECODE18+ECODE19+ECODE20+ECODE21+ECODE41+ECODE42) FAIL , SUM(ECODE11+ECODE15+ECODE41+ECODE42) SYNTAX , SUM(ECODE03+ECODE04+ECODE05) DNS , SUM(ECODE07+ECODE08+ECODE09+ECODE10+ECODE13) TRANSACT , SUM(ECODE06+ECODE19) RECEIVER , SUM(ECODE02+ECODE14) NETWORK , SUM(ECODE12+ECODE16+ECODE17+ECODE18+ECODE20+ECODE21) SERVICE FROM TS_MAILQUEUE_DOMAIN WHERE SYY + SMM >= #{searchStdDt} AND SYY + SMM <= #{searchEndDt} GROUP BY DOMAINNAME

SELECT A.MID , A.SUBID , A.REFMID , SUM(B.SCOUNT) SEND , SUM(B.ECODE01) SUCCESS FROM TS_MAILQUEUE A , TS_MAILQUEUE_RSINFO B WHERE A.MID = B.MID AND A.SUBID = B.SUBID AND A.MID = #{searchMid} GROUP BY A.MID, A.SUBID, A.REFMID
SELECT TID CD , TNM CD_NM FROM TS_SERVICETYP
SELECT RCODE CD , CD_DESC CDNM FROM TS_RCODE WHERE UILANG =#{uilang}
